prod_desc.heading: Why buy Apple iPhone 13
features: 6.1-Inch Super Retina XDR Display ensures amazing visuals
Hexa-Core A15 Bionic Chip Processor enables smooth responsiveness
Storage Of 128GB for storing the files easily
Dual Rear Camera with 12 MP front camera takes amazing pictures
Sensor-Shift Optical Image Stabilisation keeps shots steady
sub_features: Upgrade your photography skills to a new level as the Apple iPhone 13 features a brilliant combination of 12 MP (wide camera) and 12 MP (ultra-wide camera). Both the cameras take outstanding shots with absolute clarity. Filmmakers use a technique called rack focus - shifting focus from one subject to another - to guide the audience’s attention in their movies. Now iPhone makes it easy for you to bring the same storytelling technique to your videos. Portrait mode with advanced bokeh and Depth Control is also supported by this phone. See the difference with brilliantly clear selfies, made possible with a 12 MP selfie camera. It comes loaded with Animoji and Memoji, Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles and many other modes.

Coming in a gorgeous design and subtle colour, the Apple iPhone 13’s price is quite justified. Running on the iOS 15 Operating System, you can navigate through any task efficiently. Loaded with Face ID, Three‑axis gyro, Accelerometer, Barometer, Proximity sensor, Ambient light sensor, it ensures efficient usage. It features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR (2532 x 1170 pixels) display providing an immersive view for both videos and games. Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating keeps the screen protected from fingerprints. Thanks to the 3825 mAh Lithium-Ion super capacity battery, now you can use your phone for long hours without worrying about its charge. It comes with up to up to 15 Watts MagSafe wireless charging support. Coming with 128GB of storage, it lets you store your files conveniently.

features.title: Display
features.desc: 6.1 inches (15.4 cm), Super Retina XDR OLED

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 12 MP + 12 MP Dual Rear & 12 MP Front Camera

faqs.que: Is it easy to transfer my data and set up my new iPhone?
faqs.ans: iPhone models currently sold on apple.com work with compatible networks around the world, including 5G and 4G LTE networks. Check with your home network provider regarding international roaming charges, or purchase a compatible nano-SIM at your destination.

iPhone 14, iPhone 14 Plus, iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 14 Pro Max, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 mini are 5G capable. For 5G access, you need to activate your iPhone with a network provider that offers 5G service. Some providers may also require a 5G service plan or a new SIM. Contact your provider for more information. Learn more about network providers in your country

faqs.que: What are my delivery options, and when will I get my items?
faqs.ans: Delivery estimates are based on item availability and the shipping option you choose. You'll get a final delivery date after you place your order.Free next-day delivery is available for any in-stock items and free standard delivery on all orders.

faqs.que: How many hours iPhone 14 Pro Max Battery last?
faqs.ans: Usage time for iPhone 14 Pro Max was 11 hours 44 minutes active with 16 hours standby for a total of 27 hours and 44 minutes
